paper_abstract: We prove results on exact asymptotics of the probabilities P{(1)(0)integral vertical bar eta(t)(p) dt <= epsilon(p)}, epsilon -> 0 where 2 <= p <= 8, for two types of Gaussian processes eta(t), namely, a stationary Ornstein-Uhlenbeck process and a Gaussian diffusion process satisfying the stochastic differential equation {dZ(t) = dw(t) + g(t)Z(t) dt, t epsilon [0,1], Z(0) = 0 Derivation of the results is based on the principle of comparison with a Wiener process and Girsanov's absolute continuity theorem.
paper_title: Exact asymptotics of small deviations for a stationary Ornstein-Uhlenbeck process and some Gaussian diffusion processes in the L(p)-norm, 2 <= p <=infinity
